111.title: Ryan

1112.content:
You wake up one afternoon feeling refreshed. Everyone has broken up from school for the summer break, you have finished school and have your application form to go straight on to university. Life was good, but it is best to bask in the time you have off before the real and hard work begins. It's a shame your dipshit siblings are off with you but soon you could move out and into student accomodation and have your own freedom. You look at the clock feeling a bit groggy from your sleep in: 14:00. I better get up...

You hear a knock on the door. "Come in!" you call out, a bit irritated but you were in a good mood. It was your dense younger brother, Ryan. "What do you want?"

Ryan prances in wearing his gym gear, he's clearly been training. He has a big victorious grin on his face. "Guess what I find!"

"What is it?" you ask, mildly curious as to what has gotten him to show off his feathers.

He pulls out his phone and goes to youtube and plays a video. It's a video of you from 18 years old at a party with your friends burning money in front of a homeless man. Both you, the homeless man and everyone else were too drunk to understand what was going on. You had no recollection of doing this ever and you were completely shocked. Speechless. oh my god... did I do that?

You felt low and cruel. You were dreaming of becoming a solicitor and you had quite a social conscience, doing something like that was totally out of character. And who filmed it?!

"Your university really should do better vetting... they seem to be letting anyone in... or are they? What do you think they would do if they saw this?" Ryan tauned, dangling the phone in front of you. You went white, you were a deer caught in the headlights. They would remove you from the course, your ambitions of going to law school would be ruined! You look down at the ground in shame and fear. "What do you want from me?" you mumbled.

"What do I want? I want to show this to your university! To show them what a shit person they're taking in, you shouldn't be going anywhere near a law degree!" chiding you as if you were a child.

"Ryan, please, what do you want from me to keep this quiet? You'll ruin my life!"

"Am I supposed to be sympathetic? Some brother you've always been, I don't recall you ever saying or doing anything nice for me!"

You were close to tears, you collapsed back on the bed and your voice began to break. "Ryan, please. How can I make this right? What do you want from me, what do I need to do?"

Your emotion did not move him. He pouted at you and then laughed but began to think... the few seconds he was thinking felt like an eternity. You could tell. He was about to name his price.

"I'd like you to be nicer to me over the summer break. And to everyone else. And you have to do some nice gestures for us, as a token of how much you truly love us" he proclaimed grinning ear to ear.

"Yes, I'll do anything, I've always looked up to you, Ryan. From now on, I'll show that in a better way!" you blurted out submissively. "What nice gesture would you like from me? Do you have any ideas?"

He began thinking again. "Well I suppose you could come into my room and...
1112.title: He blackmails you

11121.content:
"Well I suppose you could come into my room and massage my feet."

You were quite taken aback by that demand. That was nothing like your brother at all. And it seemed quite a disgusting task too, you could tell he had just been training. He was always vigorous at the gym. Pushing himself to the limit. And now he looked as red as a tomato, his sweat bands originally white were grey in areas and he had a cheesy vinegar-like aroma about him.

"I'll give you some time to process this. See you in my room in 5 minutes and I hope you are nice about this" that last part sounded like a threat. He left the room and you were bamboozled by all of this. You burned money in front of a homeless man like an elitist piece of trash?! Your brother somehow acquired that video and was now making you his masseuse?! And from the sounds of it, he wanted you to fully cooperate with this nicely too.

You walk up to his door and gulp and take a deep breathe. Opening the door to his room, you see Ryan lying across his bed with his sneakers still on. He smiled at you, "oh hi, John, did you want something?"

"You asked me to massage your feet?"

"I don't recall... but if you're still offering.. I've just sat down and a massage right now would be amazing..."

"Okay... no problem..." you mumble. Sheepishly walking up to your brother, he stretched out his feet to you on the edge of his bed. You tried to sit down on the bed but he kicked your hand off. fine...

You kneeled down on the floor and his face were at face level with you. You took off the shoe of his right foot and were hit by a pungent thick cheesy odour. You took off his other shoe and the smell doubled. You felt sick to your stomach. There in front of you were the sweaty steamy size 11's of your brother Ryan, wiggling his toes at you. You could see his face in between his feet looking at you with a shit eating grin.

You took the soles of his right foot and began rubbing them with both your feet. You rubbed around the ball and the plantar of his foot in back and forth movements... "hmmmm... that's nice..." he groaned as he let his left foot fall onto your face, his toes conveniently close to your nose. "I hope you don't mind the sweat... I've been working hard today.." He looked at you, as if he was expecting a response... a certain response.

"I don't mind at all. I-it's good that you're working hard." he chuckled to himself, "that's a good way to put it.. I'm glad you don't mind...", he grabbed your nose between his toes and held it tightly for a couple of seconds before letting go. He must have seen that you looked green. "How do they smell?"

Was he serious? "Uhhh, what?" you blurted out.

"I said, how do they smell!" he repeated, cupping his toes to your nose again. "Do they smell nice?"

"Y-yes.. they smell nice. I like the smell."

"I thought so... well if you like, you can sniff my feet if you want... but only if you want too..."

You looked at him puzzled. He had that look about him again. He was expecting something. He was testing you. This was a rhetorical question.... you took his right foot and pulled it to your face and took a sheepish smaller sniff. And again.

"Do you want to take my socks off?"

You didn't respond. But you did go to take them off with your hands.

"Why don't you use your mouth? You know you want too..."

As if this could not get any worse... you bit onto the heel of his sock and pulled it backwards, as you exposed his heel. You got a good luck at it. The skin looked yellow with patterns of white dry dead skin from heavy walking... or jogging.. or running. You pulled it back further and the smell became stronger and stronger. When you pulled it free, Ryan wiggled his toes and you saw pieces of toe jam between each of his toes. The smell.. that smell... It was something you would never ever forget.

You repeated the process for his second foot and he then looked at you and his feet. You continued his massage for a period. 10 minutes went by. 10 minutes that felt like 60. He would break up this time by cupping his toes to your nose and waiting for you to take a sniff. The sniffing varied from sheepish small sniffs to larger sniffs. "Keep sniffing like that. The breeze feels nice in between my toes" he mocked.

Eventually, he massage became just foot sniffing as you held his feet to your face and humiliated yourself by taking sniff after sniff for about 20 minutes. He pressed both of his feet to your face and told you: "I bet you I can't hear you sniff as hard as you can..." your response was to take a deep sniff. He laughed and you went red as a tomatoe. This is the worst day of my life...

You stopped sniffing for a moment, consumed in shame. In that time, you felt something wet pressed against your lips. You came back to your sense and your brothers toes were pressed against your lips. He pulled his foot back quickly convincingly feigning shock. "Did you just kiss my foot?!" he blurted out, struggling to hold back laughter. There was a silence that filled the room... what do you say? You clearly did not but this entire time, he has been asking you questions he wanted to hear a certain answer too...

info.brief_description: Enslaved by one or all of your siblings. Or perhaps you do the enslaved?
info.description:
Characters:

John (you) - 23 years old, you are the oldest among your 5 siblings, you are the smartest person in the room and typically quick to remind people about that. There is a lot of rivalry between you and your two brothers as you antagonise them a lot.

Ryan - 21 years old, he is a stereotypical jock. Well built, slightly dense and he has a superiority complex thanks primarily in part due to your bullying.

Jack - 20 years old, he is not so smart, not so strong, but nor is he weak or stupid. You get along with him the least, he and Ryan typically band together against you which is saying a lot because they don't get along too well either. He is lactose intolerant.

Rebecca and Jodie - 18 year old twins, these two largely stick to themselves. They are twins and virtually inseperable. Rebecca is a tom boy with a crude sense of humour, Jodie is a lady with a bitchy streak. Both like to go out a lot and the only other people they think about other than themselves is each other.

Holly - 17 years old, she is the youngest of the family and a spoiled brat. She bickers with everyone but ultimately gets along with Ryan, Jack and the twins quite well. She is on her schools cheer leading team and is one of the popular kids.

Rules:
No under 16's, shrinking or killing. Feel free to introduce other characters.
Keep the chapters at least 1 paragraph long.
Ryan can be mind controlled, blackmailed, forcefully enslaved or willingly become a slave but if he willingly becomes a slave half way through the story, make a build up towards his enjoyment in the role rather than just saying all of a sudden he liked being humiliated. Him liking it from the first chapter is okay.
This story is a heavy BDSM story involving foot worship, fart slavery, scat, golden showers, heavy humiliation, abuse, ect. Not for the faint of hearted.
